_header: A filth that God almighty hateth
_description: On sin — two couplets in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
A filthe þat god almithten hateȝA foul sting þat is
                    angeles wlateȝA wikke ded þat þe deuel liketȝA
                    sori euel þat þis werd beswyketȝ
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 31.
